channel.title: Making Objects, and making them tele you somewhere
channel.description:
Hello,
I would like to know how to put an object somewhere and make it teleport me to a certain coordinate. Pretty much all I need to know is where to I go to put this object in?? (ex. In PimpScape there is a door in varrok that teleports me to PK Box/Dragon Lair) Where do i put this object???

To make it teleport you just add a case to Quest 1 first click objects or somethin like that

item.source: Making Objects, and making them tele you somewhere

item.title: Making Objects, and making them tele you somewhere
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

To make objects, first search for: public boolean process
Then paste this under it:

house();

Now search for: public void ChangeDoor

Paste this above it:

public void Replacefloor(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) {
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));

	outStream.createFrame(101);
	outStream.writeByteC((22<<2) + (Face&3));
	outStream.writeByte(0);

	if (NewObjectID != -1) {
		outStream.createFrame(151);
		outStream.writeByteS(0);
		outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID);
		outStream.writeByteS((22<<2) + (Face&3));
		//FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
		//ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration
	}}

public void robject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) {
outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60);
outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));
/DELETE OBJECT/
outStream.writeByte(101);
outStream.writeByteC(0);
outStream.writeByte(0);
/CREATE OBJECT/
if (NewObjectID > -1) {
outStream.writeByte(151);
outStream.writeByteS(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID);
outStream.writeByteA(Face); //0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
}
outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
}

public void Addaobject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)
{
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

outStream.createFrame(151);
//outStream.writeByteA(((x&7) << 4) + (y&7));
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3));
}
public void house()
{
Addaobject(2656, 3696, 4460, 0, 10);//table (guthix clan)
Addaobject(2659, 3683, 2875, 0, 10);//guthix statue (guthix clan)
Addaobject(2658, 3647, 444, 0, 10);//boulder (guthix clan)
Addaobject(2660, 3647, 444, 0, 10);//boulder (guthix clan)
Addaobject(2662, 3647, 444, 0, 10);//boulder (guthix clan)
Addaobject(2664, 3647, 444, 0, 10);//boulder (guthix clan)
Addaobject(2666, 3647, 444, 0, 10);//boulder (guthix clan)
Addaobject(2662, 3646, 2875, 0, 10);//guthix statue (guthix clan)
Addaobject(3282, 3029, 2875, 0, 10);//guthix statue (guthix clan)
}

Just replace what i have above to what you want.

(remember i borrowed this from someone else, trying not to be much of a leecher)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 07:47:14 PM[/size][hr]any problems let me know

Read full topic

item.title: Making Objects, and making them tele you somewhere
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

well, i dont know exactly how, but use my guthix statue tele:

if you have cheezscape/ testscape, this should work:

look for: public void TakeCape(
then paste this below is:

if(theifTimer == 0) {
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2416 == true) {
setAnimation(emote);
sendMessage("You bow down to "+god);
sendMessage(“You recieve 2 coins.”);
addSkillXP(XPamount, XPSkillNum);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
theifTimer = delay;
if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
else if (absY <= 3672)
{
teleportToX = 3282;
teleportToY = 3028;
}
else if (absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970)
{
teleportToX = 3282;
teleportToY = 3028;
}
else if (absY >= 10112)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}

This means if your holding a guthix staff and you pray at a guthix statue, it tele’s you to these cordinates.

Now making objects.

(This is borrowed from someone else on the forums, i hope its ok with them)

Ill make making objects below this

Read full topic
